examples: his no was loud and clear

definitions.text: a radioactive transuranic element synthesized by bombarding curium with carbon ions; 7 isotopes are known
quantifier; used with either mass nouns or plural count nouns for indicating a complete or almost complete lack or zero quantity of
examples: no eggs left and no money to buy any
I'll get you there in no time

definitions.text: referring to the degree to which a certain quality is present
examples: he was no heavier than a child

definitions.text: not in any degree or manner; not at all
used to express refusal or denial or disagreement etc or especially to emphasize a negative statement
